body_html:
Branch almost ready here: https://github.com/lantiga/pytorch/tree/upsample_1d

The CPU version works and tests pass.

I still have an issue on Cuda that I'm trying to sort out: it builds correctly but then when I import torch from Python I get:

Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "<stdin>", line 1, in <module>
  File "/home/ubuntu/src/anaconda2/lib/python2.7/site-packages/torch/__init__.py", line 53, in <module>
    from torch._C import *
ImportError: /home/ubuntu/src/anaconda2/lib/python2.7/site-packages/torch/lib/libATen.so.1: undefined symbol: THNN_CudaDoubleTemporalUpSamplingLinear_updateGradInput

although the symbol seems defined in libTHCUNN.so.1.

body:
Branch almost ready here: https://github.com/lantiga/pytorch/tree/upsample_1d

The CPU version works and tests pass.

I still have an issue on Cuda that I'm trying to sort out: it builds correctly but then when I `import torch` from Python I get:
```
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "<stdin>", line 1, in <module>
  File "/home/ubuntu/src/anaconda2/lib/python2.7/site-packages/torch/__init__.py", line 53, in <module>
    from torch._C import *
ImportError: /home/ubuntu/src/anaconda2/lib/python2.7/site-packages/torch/lib/libATen.so.1: undefined symbol: THNN_CudaDoubleTemporalUpSamplingLinear_updateGradInput
```
although the symbol seems defined in `libTHCUNN.so.1`.
